name: Add Google Sheets rows from Survey Anyplace responses
description:
Every time you receive a new response in Survey Anyplace, Make will automatically add selected data from the response to a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet
The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1MWUyZs9NlhRBgATgPdoLTQqJMFeLamMSJxd7MROanSI/edit?usp=sharing)
